title: Goldilocks and the three bears
creator_contributor_role: Victorian Council for Children's Films and Television, distributor
subject_group: Literature/Fairy tales - Film and video adaptations
Literature/Children's literature - Film and video adaptations
description: Episode of Series "Faerie tale theatre". Tatum O'Neal stars as the mischievious but lovable heroine in the classic fairy tale of a child who invades the home of three bears. This version features a production design based on the all-American style of illustrator Norman Rockwell and more acrobatics than any previous version. Goldilocks teaches children a valuable lesson about respect for the property of others. Co-starring Alex Karras, Carole King, John Lithgow and Hoyt Axton.
related_objects: Series; S00998; Faerie tale theatre; Active; 1984
